column1: Generic error message for required data elements: Data value required for tag <Data Element Number>
Generic error message for incorrect Observation Code Values: <Data Element Number> contains invalid value <value>
Generic error message for incorrect Max length: Maximum length exceeds for tag <Data Element Number>
Generic error message for future Date and Time: <Data Element Number> contains Future date
Generic error message for inpresise Date and Time: <Data Element Number> does not contain minimum precision of “CCYYMMDD”
Generic error message for inpresise full Date and Time: <Data Element Number> does not contain full precision date

column3: BUSINESS RULE
column7: ERROR DESCRIPTION

column3: For ICSR sent to the postmaket route use the value "ZZFDA".
column7: ICSR sent to the postmaket route does not have the value "ZZFDA" for N.1.4

column3: For ICSR sent to the premaket route use the value "ZZFDA_PREMKT".
column7: ICSR sent to the premaket route does not have the value "ZZFDA_PREMKT" for N.1.4

column2: ICH ICSR Message Header (message wrapper) (Repeat as necessary)

column7: N.2.r.2 provided is not same for all reports and does not match with N.1.3

column3:
For postmarket ICSRs
Use the value "CDER". If Batch Receiver Identifier (N.1.4) = "ZZFDA", then Message Receiver Identifier (N.2.r.3) must be 'CDER'
column7: N.1.4 = "ZZFDA" but N.2.r.3 is not "CDER"

column3:
For premarket ICSRs
For CDER IND use the value "CDER_IND" or
For CBER IND use the value "CBER_IND" or
For CDER IND-exempt BA/BE use the value  "CDER_IND_EXEMPT_BA_BE"

If Batch Receiver Identifier (N.1.4) = "ZZFDA_PREMKT", then Message Receiver Identifier (N.2.r.3) must be either 'CDER_IND' or 'CBER_IND' or 'CDER_IND_EXEMPT_BA_BE'
column7: N.1.4 = "ZZFDA_PREMKT" but N.2.r.3 is not "CDER_IND" or "CBER_IND" or "CDER_IND_EXEMPT_BA_BE"

column2: Identification of the Case Safety Report

column3: If Batch Receiver Identifier (N.1.4) = ZZFDA_PREMKT and Message Receiver Identifier (N.2.r.3) = 'CDER_IND' or 'CBER_IND' or 'CDER_IND_EXEMPT_BA_BE' and (IND Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5a) or Pre-ANDA Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5b)) is provided and Study Type Where Reaction(s) / Event(s) Were Observed (C.5.4) = (1, 2 or 3) then Type of Report (C.1.3) must be 2=Report from Study
column7: C.1.3 must be 2 when N.1.4 = "ZZFDA_PREMKT" and N.2.r.3 = 'CDER_IND' or 'CBER_IND' or 'CDER_IND_EXEMPT_BA_BE' and (FDA.C.5.5a or FDA.C.5.5b) is provided and C.5.4 = (1, 2 or 3)

column3: If Batch Receiver Identifier (N.1.4) = ZZFDA_PREMKT and Message Receiver Identifier (N.2.r.3) = 'CDER_IND' or 'CBER_IND' and IND Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5a) is provided and Study Type Where Reaction(s) / Event(s) Were Observed (C.5.4) is not provided then Type of Report (C.1.3) must be 1=Spontaneous
column7: C.1.3 must be 1 when N.1.4 = "ZZFDA_PREMKT" and N.2.r.3 = ('CDER_IND' or 'CBER_IND') and FDA.C.5.5a is provided and C.5.4 is not provided

column3: If Batch Receiver Identifier (N.1.4) = ZZFDA_PREMKT and Message Receiver Identifier (N.2.r.3) = "CDER_IND_EXEMPT_BA_BE" then C.1.3 must be 2 (Clinical trail).
column7: C.1.3 must be 2 when N.1.4 = "ZZFDA_PREMKT" and N.2.r.3 = 'CDER_IND_EXEMPT_BA_BE'

column3: If Batch Receiver Identifier (N.1.4) = ZZFDA_PREMKT and Message Receiver Identifier (N.2.r.3) = 'CDER_IND' or 'CBER_IND' then C.1.3 must not be (3 (Other) or 4 (Not available to sender (unknown)).
column7: C.1.3 must not be 3 or 4 when N.1.4 = "ZZFDA_PREMKT" and N.2.r.3 = 'CDER_IND' or 'CBER_IND'

column2: Date Report Was First Received from Source
Date of Most Recent Information for This Report
Additional Available Documents Held by Sender
Documents Held by Sender (repeat as necessary)

column3: Optional, but required if C.1.6.1 is ‘true’.
column7: C.1.6.1.r.1 must be provided when C.1.6.1 = true

column3: Compression is not used for US reporting and encoding is limited to B64.
column7: Compression used for US reporting and encoding is not B64.

column2: Does This Case Fulfil the Local Criteria for an Expedited Report?
column3: FDA does not support use of the nullFlavor 'NI' for this data element in initial submissions. Initial submissions with nullFlavor NI will be rejected.
column7: nullFlavor 'NI' used for initial report submission

column3:
For postmarket ICSRs
If Combination Product Report Indicator (FDA.C.1.12) = True and Does This Case Fulfil the Local Criteria for an Expedited Report? (C.1.7) = True, Observation Code: (Value allowed: 1, 4)
column7: FDA.C.1.7.1 must have Observation Code Value of 1 or 4 when FDA.C.1.12 = true and C.1.7 = true

column3:
For postmarket ICSRs
If Combination Product Report Indicator (FDA.C.1.12) = True and Does This Case Fulfil the Local Criteria for an Expedited Report? (C.1.7) = False or NI, Observation Code: (Value allowed: 2, 5)
column7: FDA.C.1.7.1 must have Observation Code Value of 2 or 5 when FDA.C.1.12 = true and C.1.7 = false or nullFlavor "NI"

column3:
For postmarket ICSRs
If Combination Product Report Indicator (FDA.C.1.12) = False or NI and Does This Case Fulfil the Local Criteria for an Expedited Report? (C.1.7) = True, Observation Code: (Value allowed: 1)
column7: FDA.C.1.7.1 must have Observation Code Value of 1 when FDA.C.1.12 = false or NI and C.1.7 = true

column3:
For postmarket ICSRs
If Combination Product Report Indicator (FDA.C.1.12) = False or NI and Does This Case Fulfil the Local Criteria for an Expedited Report? (C.1.7) = False or NI, Observation Code: (Value allowed: 2)
column7: FDA.C.1.7.1 must have Observation Code Value of 2 when FDA.C.1.12 = false or nullFlavor "NI" and C.1.7 = false or nullFlavor "NI"

column3:
For premarket ICSRs
For 15-Day or 7-Day Expedited report, if Does This Case Fulfil the Local Criteria for an Expedited Report? (C.1.7) = True and Type of Report (C.1.3) = (1 (Spontaneous) or 2 (Report from Study)) then Observation Code: (Value allowed: 1, 6) respectively.
column7: FDA.C.1.7.1 must have Observation Code Value of 1 or 6 when C.1.7 = true and C.1.3 = 1 or 2

column2: Other Case Identifiers in Previous Transmissions
Source(s) of the Case Identifier(s) (repeat as necessary)

column3: If Other Case Identifiers in Previous Transmissions (C.1.9.1) = True then Source(s) of the Case Identifier (C.1.9.1.r.1) cannot be empty
column7: At least one C.1.9.1.r.1 must be provided when C.1.9.1 = true

column3: If Other Case Identifiers in Previous Transmissions (C.1.9.1) = True and Source(s) of the Case Identifier (C.1.9.1.r.1) is available then Case Identifier(s) (C.1.9.1.r.2) cannot be empty
column7: C.1.9.1.r.2 must be provided for C.1.9.1.r.1 = <value>

column2: Identification Number of the Report Which Is Linked to This Report (repeat as necessary)
Identification Number of the Report Which Is Linked to This Report
column3:
For premarket ICSRs
If Patient (name or initials) (D.1) = AGGREGRATE, then Identification Number of the Report Which Is Linked to This Report (C.1.10.r ) should be provided for all Sender’s (case) Safety Report Unique Identifier (C.1.1) that makes up an Aggregate Analysis as per 312.32(c)(1)(i)(C) whether previously sent to FAERS or to eCTD (use Manufacturer Control Number (MCN))
column7: C.1.10.r should be provided when D.1 = "AGGREGRATE"
C.1.11.1 must not have the value (1 or 2) for an initial report

column3: Optional, but required when C.1.11.1 is populated.
column7: C.1.11.2 must be  provided when C.1.11.1 is provided

column2: Primary Source(s) of Information (repeat as necessary)

column3: Optional, but required if C.2.r.5 = 1.
column7: C.2.r.3 must be provided when C.2.r.5 = 1

column3: Optional, but required if C.2.r.5 = 1.
column7: C.2.r.4 must be provided when C.2.r.5 = 1
At least one reporter must be provided with C.2.r.5 = 1

column2: Information on Sender of Case Safety Report

column3: Required if the ‘Sender Type’ (C.3.1) is not coded as 7 (Patient / Consumer).
column7: C.3.2 must be provided when C.3.1 = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 or 6

column2: Sender's Address, Fax, Telephone and E-mail Address
Study Type Where Reaction(s) / Event(s) Were Observed
column3: Optional, but required if C.1.3=2(Report from study)
column7: C.5.4 must be provided when C.1.3 =2

column3: If Type of Report (C.1.3) is 2 (Report from Study) and Message Receiver Identifier (N.2.r.3) = 'CDER_IND' or 'CBER_IND' or 'CDER_IND_EXEMPT_BA_BE' and Batch Receiver Identifier (N.1.4) = 'ZZFDA_PREMKT' then Observation Code: (Value allowed: 1, 2, 3) for Study Type Where Reaction(s) / Event(s) Were Observed (C.5.4)
column7: C.5.4 must be 1, 2 or 3 when C.1.3 = 2 and N.2.r.3 = "CDER_IND" or "CBER_IND" or "CDER_IND_EXEMPT_BA_BE" and N.1.4 = "ZZFDA_PREMKT"

column3: If Type of Report (C.1.3) is 1 (Spontaneous) and Message Receiver Identifier (N.2.r.3) = 'CDER' then Study Type Where Reaction(s) / Event(s) Were Observed must not be provided
column7: C.5.4 must not be provided when C.1.3 = 1 and N.2.r.3 = "CDER"

column3: If Type of Report (C.1.3) is 2 (Report from Study) and Message Receiver Identifier (N.2.r.3) = 'CDER' and Batch Receiver Identifier (N.1.4) = 'ZZFDA' then Observation Code: (Value allowed: 1, 2, 3) for Study Type Where Reaction(s) / Event(s) Were Observed (C.5.4)
column7: C.5.4 must be 1 or 2 or 3 when C.1.3 = 2, N.2.r.3 = "CDER" and N.1.4 = 'ZZFDA'

column3: If Type of Report (C.1.3) is 1 (Spontaneous) and Batch Receiver Identifier (N.1.4) = ZZFDA_PREMKT and Message Receiver Identifier (N.2.r.3) = 'CDER_IND' or 'CBER_IND' then C.5.4 must not be provided.
column7: C.5.4 must not be provided when N.1.4 = "ZZFDA_PREMKT" and N.2.r.3 = 'CDER_IND' or 'CBER_IND' and C.1.3 =1

column3: If Patient (name or initials) (D.1) = AGGREGRATE, then Observation Code: (Value allowed: 1) for Study Type Where Reaction(s) / Event(s) Were Observed (C.5.4)
column7: C.5.4 should be 1 when D.1 = "AGGREGRATE"

column3:
If Type of Report (C.1.3) is (1=Spontaneous or 2=Report from study) and Message Receiver Identifier (N.2.r.3) = 'CDER_IND' or 'CBER_IND' then IND Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5a) is required. The format must be "123456".  

For IND safety reports submitted from an aggregate analysis (312.32(c)(1)(i)(C)) from trials conducted under more than one IND, use the “Parent” IND number
column7: FDA.C.5.5a must be provided when C.1.3 = (1 or 2) and N.2.r.3 = "CDER_IND" or "CBER_IND"

column3: IND Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5a) must not be provided for a postmaket report.
column7: FDA.C.5.5a must not be provided when N.2.r.3 = "CDER" or "CBER" and N.1.4 = "ZZFDA"

column3: The IND Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5a) must be a valid number registered with the FDA.
column7: FDA.C.5.5a is invalid for the Center specified in N.2.r.3

column3: If Type of Report (C.1.3) is 2=Report from study and Message Receiver Identifier (N.2.r.3) = 'CDER_IND_EXEMPT_BA_BE' then Pre-ANDA Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5b) is required. The format must be "234567" for IND-exempt BA/BE study.
column7: FDA.C.5.5b must be provided when C.1.3 = 2 and N.2.r.3 = "CDER_IND_EXEMPT_BA_BE"

column3: The Pre-ANDA Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5b) must not be provided for a postmarket report.
column7: FDA.C.5.5b must not be provided when N.2.r.3 = "CDER" or "CBER" and N.1.4 = "ZZFDA"

column3: The Pre-ANDA Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5b) must be a valid number registered with the FDA.
column7: FDA.C.5.5b is invalid for the Center specified in N.2.r.3

column2: IND number of cross reported IND
column3: If IND Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5a) is populated, then IND number of cross reported IND (FDA.C.5.6.r) is required. Use nullFlavor=NA if there are no other cross reported IND
column7: FDA.C.5.6.r is not provided or nullFlavor is not 'NA' when FDA.C.5.5a is provided

column3: The IND Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.6.r) must not be provided for a postmarket report.
column7: FDA.C.5.6.r must not be provided when N.2.r.3 = "CDER" or "CBER" and N.1.4 = "ZZFDA"

column3: IND number of cross reported IND (FDA.C.5.6.r) must be a valid number registered with the FDA.
column7: FDA.C.5.6.r is invalid for the Center specified in N.2.r.3

column3:
For postmarket ICSRs
The element must use nullFlavor "NA" where no patient is involved. (e.g. Medication error, Compounding)

For combination product, if a single report is reported for a malfunction without an adverse event, the element value must use nullFlavor "NA".

For combination product, if there are multiple malfunction reports with no adverse event, then the element value should be “SUMMARY”.
column7: D.1 must be nullFlavor 'NA' when  FDA.C.1.12 = true and FDA.G.k.12.r.1 = true and E.i.2.1b = 10067482

column3:
For premarket ICSRs
For Aggregate Report, the element value must be “AGGREGATE”. 
If Type of Report (C.1.3) = 2 (Report from study) and Identification Number of the Report Which Is Linked to This Report (C.1.10.r ) and IND Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5a) is populated, then Patient (name or initials) (D.1) must have the value  'AGGREGATE'
column7: D.1 value must be "AGGREGATE" when C.1.3=2 and C.1.10.r and FDA.C.5.5a is provided

column3:
Appropriate nullFlavor must be used if FDA.D.11.r (Patient Race Code) is not reportable.

If Patient (name or initials) (D.1) is nullFlavor "NA" or "SUMMARY" then use nullFlavor: NA

If Patient (name or initials) (D.1) is "AGGREGATE"  then use nullFlavor: NA
column7: FDA.D.11.r should be provided as nullFlavor "NA" when D.1 is provided as nullFlavor "NA" or "SUMMARY" or "AGGREGRATE"

column3:

column3: Optional, but required if F.r.3.2 is populated. Constrained UCUM is not provided for this unit.  Select most appropriate unit from UCUM codes.
column7: F.r.3.3 must be provided when F.r.3.2 is provided

column3: Optional, but required if F.r.2 is populated, and F.r.3 is not populated.
column7: At least one of test results (F.r.3.1, F.r.3.2, F.r.3.4) must contain a value when F.r.2.2b is provided.

column3:
For postmarket ICSRs
The first product (under section G) should have this data element answered as ‘1’ (=Suspect) or ‘3’ (=Interacting), unless the product has at least once device constituent part where Malfunction (FDA.G.k.12.r.1) is “true”, in which case the Observation Code: (Value allowed: 1, 3, 4)
column7: The first product reported does not have G.k.1 with Observation Code Value of 1, 3 or 4.

column3:
For postmarket ICSRs
At least one product must be reported with Observation Code: (Value allowed: 1, 3, 4)
column7: G.k.1 must be provided with Observation Code Value of 1, 3 or 4 when N.2.r.3 = "CDER"

column3:
For premarket ICSRs
For IND ICSRs, Only use Observation Code: (Value allowed: 1, 2, 3) and at least one product must be reported with Observation Code: (Value allowed: 1, 3)
column7: G.k.1 must be provided with Observation Code Value of 1 or 3 when C.1.3 = 2 and N.2.r.3 = "CDER_IND" or "CBER_IND"

column3: For IND-exempt BA/BE ICSRs, Use Observation Code: (Value allowed: 1, 2, 3, 4) and at least one product must be reported with Observation Code: (Value allowed: 1, 3, 4)
column7: G.k.1 must be provided with Observation Code Value of 1, 3 or 4 when C.1.3 = 2 and N.2.r.3 = "CDER_EXEMPT_BA_BE"

column2: FDA Other Characterisation of Drug Role
column3: For Similar Device Observation Code: (Value allowed: 1) is only allowed if Combination Product Report Indicator (FDA.C.1.12) is 'true', Malfunction (FDA.G.k.12.r.1) is 'true' and Characterisation of Drug Role (G.k.1) = '4' (Drug Not Administered) under 21 CFR 4.102(c) and 803.50
column7: G.k.1.a must be provided when FDA.C.1.12 = true and FDA.G.k.12.r. = true' and G.k.1 = 4  is provided

column2: Medicinal Product Name as Reported by the Primary Source
column3: For premarket ICSRs, Medicinal Product Name as Reported by the Primary Source (G.k.2.2) does not match the product name for the application number provided in IND Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5a) or Pre-ANDA Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5b)
column7: G.k.2.2 does not match the registered product name for application# reported in FDA.C.5.5a/FDA.C.5.5b. Ignore this message for comparator study product.

column7: G.K.3.1 should not contain “IND” or “PANDA” number when N.1.4 = “ZZFDA” and N.2.r.3 = "CDER" and C.1.3=2 and C.5.4=2 or 3

column2: Assessment of Relatedness of Drug to Reaction(s) / Event(s) (repeat as necessary)

column3:
For premarket ICSRs
Required, if Element Value for Type of Report (C.1.3) is 2 (=Report from study) and IND Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5a) is provided.
Default Source of Assessment (G.k.9.i.2.r.1 ) to "Sponsor"
column7: G.k.9.i.2.r.1 must be provided when C.1.3 = 2 and FDA.C.5.5a is provided

column3:
For premarket ICSRs
Required, if Element Value for Type of Report (C.1.3) is 2 (=Report from study) and IND Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5a) is provided.
Default Method of Assessment (G.k.9.i.2.r.2) to “FDA” to differentiate from other assessment methods.
column7: G.k.9.i.2.r.2 must be provided when C.1.3 = 2 and FDA.C.5.5a is provided

column3:
For premarket ICSRs
Required, if Element Value for Type of Report (C.1.3) is 2 (=Report from study) and IND Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5a) is provided
For IND Safety Reports, at least one suspect product should have relatedness of drug to reaction/event
For Result of Assessment (G.k.9.i.2.r.3) use the value "Suspected" or "Not Suspected"
column7: G.k.9.i.2.r.3 must be provided when C.1.3 = 2 and FDA.C.5.5a is provided

column3: If Pre-ANDA Number where AE Occurred (FDA.C.5.5b) is present, then the Observation Code: (Value allowed: 1, 2) must be used to describe the drug’s role in the IND-Exempt BA/BE study. Use nullFlavor 'NA' for all other drugs or if information is not available.
column7: FDA.G.k.10a should be provided with Observation Code value of 1, 2 or nullFlavor "NA" when FDA.C.5.5b is provided

column3:
For postmarket ICSRs
If Local Criteria Report Type (FDA.C.1.7.1) = 5, then Malfunction (FDA.G.k.12.r.1) must be 'true' for at least one suspect product
column7: FDA.G.k.12.r.1 must be 'true' for at least one suspect product when FDA.C.1.7.1 = 5

column3:
For postmarket ICSRs
Required, if Malfunction (FDA.G.k.12.r.1) is 'true'. FDA will only validate format. One or more codes can be provided.
column7: FDA.G.k.12.r.3.r must be provided when FDA.G.k.12.r.1 = true

column3:
For postmarket ICSRs
Provide valid FDA or IMDRF device problem code
column7: FDA.G.k.12.r.3.r contain invalid value

column3:
For postmarket ICSRs
If Combination Product Report Indicator (FDA.C.1.12) is true, then provide the  device brand name and the common device name. Either can be null however, if both are null a value for Device Product Code (FDA.G.k.12.r.6) is required
column7: FDA.G.k.12.r.4 and/or FDA.G.k.12.r.5 must be provided when FDA.C.1.12 = true

column3:
For postmarket ICSRs
If Combination Product Report Indicator (FDA.C.1.12) is true, then provide the  device brand name and the common device name. Either can be null however, if both are null a value for Device Product Code (FDA.G.k.12.r.6) is required
column7: FDA.G.k.12.r.4 and/or FDA.G.k.12.r.5 must be provided when FDA.C.1.12 = true

column3:
For postmarket ICSRs
If both Device Brand Name (FDA.G.k.12.r.4) and Common Device Name (FDA.G.k.12.r.5) are null, then the value for Device Product Code (FDA.G.k.12.r.6) is required
column7: FDA.G.k.12.r.6 must be provided when FDA.G.k.12.r.4 and FDA.G.k.12.r.5 are not provided

column3:
For postmarket ICSRs
Required, if Malfunction (FDA.G.k.12.r.1) is 'true' and Local Criteria Report Type (FDA.C.1.7.1) = 4 (5-Day).
column7: FDA.G.k.12.r.11.r should be provided when FDA.G.k.12.r.1 = true and FDA.C.1.7.1 = 4 (5-Day)
